920450.name: Escape The Labyrinth
920450.description:
You are cold and alone, shrouded by darkness. Using your wits and hidden items you must fight for your survival and escape a seemingly endless labyrinth. In this game, you the player are lost in a randomly generated labyrinth. You must navigate your way through the labyrinth to find the chests which contain the parts of a sword. But be aware you're not alone, you're in someone else's house, or something else. A beast of untold horror is hunting you and will try to stop you from leaving the Labyrinth. You must be quick, but be aware as many traps are hidden along the way. Make sure to keep your torch lit otherwise the darkness can claim you. Use whatever you can to make sure you can find your way back to the light. All the odds are against you, can you Escape The Labyrinth?

The main features of this game include:

- A randomly generated labyrinth to explore
- Dynamic AI which will never give up the hunt
- Hidden items that you must use to escape
920450.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
